text: Zisas mba tugera khaŋ mba gumgi ga nzuai, “Nde won ntari ga mbui kozi gu fani ndigap, ntari ga mbuav kɨɨi guman suigɨr za mbui tɨva muuŋgiap zav nan suigɨr zav zegire? Gu zazera rari tugɨratɨgap Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen pigap Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuai. Nde mba tugir nan suigɨ thagi.
